course_title: Freshmen Seminar: Anc. Med. on the Big Screen
class_notes: Course will focus on a number of movies that provide popular (and often influential) interpretations of ancient Mediterranean societies and history.
course_description:
Variable topics course introducing students to the interrelated cultures and histories of the ancient Mediterranean world. Emphasis is on the study and interpretation of primary texts and objects, including those in Emory's Carlos Museum.
.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2144, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: C. Patterson, Status: Closed
